DOC.brief_summary: The study design evaluate clinical radiographic outcome Straumann® Bone Level Implant SLActive place heal alveolar ridge ( least 8 week post extraction ) immediately provisionalised versus type implant place healed alveolar ridge provisionalised . In case implant load 16 week ( final restoration ) . The outcome evaluate 2-year period .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Immediate Provisional Restorations Bone Level Implants
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomise , control , single blind , single center study . The total study duration patient 24 month . Straumann Bone Level Ø 4.1 mm SLActive implant place single tooth replacement , follow either immediate provisional prosthetic loading provisionalised . The final prosthetic loading make 16 week implant loading . The implant length select accord clinical indication site base previous radiographic evaluation . In total 11 visit per patient schedule study . Bone level change , implant success survival rate , soft tissue change , aesthetic outcome adverse event ( AEs ) assess . The study device CE- ( Conformité Européenne , mean European Conformity ) mark product . One center United Kingdom participate .
DOC.criteria: General inclusion criterion Males female , age 18 75 year age ( subject legally able give inform consent procedure ; age limitation also present avoid inclusion subject incomplete craniofacial growth ) . Absence relevant medical condition . Patients contribute medical history elective oral surgical intervention would contraindicate excluded . In particular patient uncontrolled poorly control diabetes , unstable life threaten condition exclude . Absence uncontrolled untreated periodontal disease . Absence untreated caries lesion . Patient good medical psychological health document self assessment Patient 's availability followup accord protocol . Local inclusion criterion A single tooth replacement require incisor , canine , premolar first molar region . Multipleimplant restoration ( non adjacent test implant ) perform study ( included test implant ) . least 8 week post extraction soft tissue socket heal Presence least one adjacent tooth Presence adequate native bone achieve primary stability General exclusion criterion Patients know disease ( include control diabetes mellitus ) , infection recent surgical procedure within 30 day study initiation . Female patient pregnant lactate child bear potential use acceptable method birth control ( hormonal , barrier abstinence ) . Patients chronic treatment ( i.e. , two week ) medication know affect oral status ( e.g. , phenytoin , dihydropyridine , calcium antagonist , cyclosporine ) within one month baseline visit . Patients concomitant anticoagulant therapy warfarin ( coumadine ) , clopidogrel , ticlopidine daily aspirin 81 mg . Patients knowingly HIV Hepatitis . Physical handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene . Patients undergone administration investigational drug within 30 day study initiation . Alcoholism chronically drug abuse cause systemic compromisation . Patients heavy smoker ( > 10/cigarettes per day ) . Patients suffer known psychological disorder . Patients limited mental capacity language skills study information understood , informed consent obtain simple instruction follow . Exclude patient BOP > 30 % completion pretreatment phase . Local exclusion criterion Exclude experimental site inadequate bone availability initial stability implant achieve extended augmentation procedure and/ sinus nasal lift require . History local radiation therapy . Presence severe oral lesion . Severe bruxism clench habit Patients lack posterior occlusion severely reduce vertical dimension occlusion Patients present clinical radiological sign symptom maxillary sinus disease implant area .
